t: Too Deferential: Critiquing CCI’S Approach in the Amazon Private Label Brands Case
s: March 4, 2023 - Bipasha Kundu In this piece, the author argues that the CCI should have taken a more inquisitorial approach in the case of In Re: Allegations pertaining to private label brands related to Amazon sold in Amazon India Marketplace, borrowing from the inquisitorial practices of its Italian counterpart.
